Text.Name: IceGrass
Text.Desc: Wild grass that grow on ice plains.

Text.Name: Reed
Text.Desc: Plant growing by lake or river, having aesthetic value.

Text.Name: Raspberry
Text.Desc: Wild fruit watered by dragon saliva. It has a special spiritual effect, preventing you from feeling hungry or exhausted for half a day after eating it. However, the fruits rot quickly once they are harvested.

Text.Name: Lotus
Text.Desc: Plant growing in water, having aesthetic value. Its root is edible.

Text.Name: LittleRock
Text.Desc: Little rocks scattered on the ground.

Text.Name: IceLittleRock
Text.Desc: Little rocks scattered on the ground.
